headline: Duke Energy announces dividend payments to shareholders
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE: DUK) today declared a quarterly cash dividend on its common stock of $1.065 per share, an increase of $0.02. This dividend is payable on Sept. 16, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on Aug. 15, 2025.

headline: Duke Energy Raises Quarterly Dividend
summary: By Katherine Hamilton Duke Energy is raising its quarterly dividend by two cents to $1.065 a share. The new payout, equal to $4.26 a year, represents an annual yield of about 3.6% based on...
